determination.title: Determination
determination.text: Determination is a fundamental value in the company. It drives the constant pursuit of solutions and advancements in every field. This firm commitment not only guarantees scientific excellence but also demonstrates a dedicated and proactive approach to women's health.

humanity.title: Humanity
humanity.text: In the women's health industry, humanity is an essential value. It drives a compassionate and needs-centered approach, ensuring that every advancement is made with empathy and consideration. This genuine care reinforces trust and commitment to women's well-being.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: Innovation holds a prominent place as a brand value in the company. Its constant dedication to finding solutions demonstrates a firm commitment to progress and well-being in women's healthcare.

HOME.intro:
EndoGene.Bio is dedicated to molecular biomarker discovery in female health.

We look at epigenetic markers in menstrual blood. Our first target is the development of non-invasive biomakers for better endometriosis diagnosis and management.

core-values.title: Our core values
core-values.education-text: EndoGene.Bio prioritizes education in female health, using advanced research in menstrual blood to enhance endometriosis diagnosis.
core-values.made-for-women-text: EndoGene.Bio provides tailored, non-invasive healthcare solutions for women, empowering them with innovative care.
core-values.investigation-text: EndoGene.Bio rigorously investigates menstrual blood to enhance understanding and improve endometriosis management.

TEAM.title: Meet the team.
TEAM.intro1:
Period pain is not normal. But because of undiagnosed endometriosis, it’s a reality for 190 million women globally. At EndoGene.bio, we will be helping women across the world get access to early diagnosis through cutting-edge epigenetics.

Endometriosis affects 10% of women, takes 7 years to diagnose and has high societal and economic costs. In the EU and US alone, the estimated cost of delayed diagnosis reaches €300B.
TEAM.intro2:
This is caused by a lack of specific and early tests. At EndoGene.Bio, we are developing a prescription diagnostic test based on epigenetic biomarkers found in menstrual blood that patients can take in the comfort of their home

With this technology, we will reduce time to diagnosis from 7 years to two consultations: one to get your test done, one to get your results.

no-posts.title: Posts not available
no-posts.message: Looks like our latest updates are still in the lab.

TECHNOLOGY.title: We bring precision medicine to female health.
TECHNOLOGY.title2: We have a dedicated team of experts in female health, specialised in uterine and endometrium science.
TECHNOLOGY.introText:
endogene.bio’s research platform helps discover molecular biomarkers to better diagnose and stratify patients, and to improve drug discovery processes using menstrual blood.

We work with analytical laboratories to provide diagnostic tests and we assist pharmaceutical companies in optimizing drug development and patient stratification for clinical trials.

We are determined to address the historical underrepresentation of female biology in medical research and bring precision medicine to female health.

CAPABILITIES.title: capabilities
CAPABILITIES.1: // 150 m<sup>2</sup> of facilities, including 42 m<sup>2</sup> of P2 laboratory space
CAPABILITIES.3: // Specific cell type isolation, phenotyping and immunoprofiling
CAPABILITIES.4: // Bioinformatic analysis: epigenetics, genetics, transcriptomics (bulk & single cell)
CAPABILITIES.5: // Sample expertise: menstrual blood, endometrial and endometriosis lesion biopsy
